Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bowl
Description: Bowl with a slightly restricted mouth, simple lip and flat base. The surface, which bears no slip, is of a pale pink colour. The asymmetrical and the misshapen mouth denotes a lack of skill in the manufacturing process. Both surfaces were simply polished, though more carefully rendered on the inside than the outside.
